verses.verse: Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8104>them<s%>, Ye have kept all that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8085>you<s%>, and have hearkened unto my <S%H6963>voice<s%> in all that I commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>:

ye have not <S%H5800>left<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> these <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, but have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And now <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath given <S%H5117>rest<s%> unto your <S%H251>brethren<s%>, as he <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H6437>them<s%>: therefore now turn <S%H3212>ye<s%>, and get you unto your <S%H168>tents<s%>, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

Only take <S%H3966>diligent<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> and the <S%H8451>law<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H157>you<s%>, to love <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and to <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto <S%H5647>him<s%>, and to serve him with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H7971>them<s%>, and sent them away; and they <S%H3212>went<s%> unto their <S%H168>tents<s%>.

Now to the <S%H2677>one<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> inheritance in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>; but unto the other <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>; moreover when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> sent them <S%H7971>away<s%> unto their <S%H168>tents<s%>, he blessed <S%H1288>them<s%>,

and <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, <S%H7725>Return<s%> with <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5233>wealth<s%> unto your <S%H168>tents<s%>, and with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, with <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and with <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and with <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H8008>raiment<s%>: <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> with your <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H3212>departed<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, to the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H272>possession<s%>, whereof they were <S%H270>possessed<s%>, according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> unto the region about the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, that is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H4758>to<s%> look <S%H4758>upon<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H1121>Behold<s%>, the children of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> have <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H4136>forefront<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, in the <S%H1552>region<s%> about the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, on the side that <S%H5676>pertaineth<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H5712>it<s%>, the whole congregation of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, to go <S%H5927>up<s%> against them to <S%H6635>war<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and to <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>,

and with him <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%>, one <S%H5387>prince<s%> of a <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and they were every <S%H376>one<s%> of them <S%H7218>head<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%> among the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And they <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and to <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and they <S%H1696>spake<s%> with <S%H559>them<s%>, saying,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, What <S%H4604>trespass<s%> is this that ye have <S%H4603>committed<s%> against the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to turn <S%H7725>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, in that ye have <S%H1129>builded<s%> you an <S%H4196>altar<s%>, to <S%H4775>rebel<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>?

Is the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%> too <S%H4592>little<s%> for <S%H2891>us<s%>, from which we have not cleansed ourselves unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, although there came a <S%H5063>plague<s%> upon the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>,

that ye must turn <S%H7725>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? and it will <S%H4775>be<s%>, seeing ye rebel <S%H3117>to-day<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that <S%H4279>to-morrow<s%> he will be <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Howbeit <S%H389><s%>, if the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%> be <S%H2931>unclean<s%>, then pass ye <S%H5674>over<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, wherein <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%>, and take <S%H270>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H4775>us<s%>: but rebel not against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against <S%H1129>us<s%>, in building you an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H1107>besides<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.

Did not <S%H5912>Achan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> in the devoted <S%H2764>thing<s%>, and <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H1961>fell<s%> upon all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? and that <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1478>perished<s%> not <S%H259>alone<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

The Mighty <S%H410>One<s%>, God, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H430><s%> the Mighty <S%H410>One<s%>, God, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H430><s%> he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%>; and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> he shall <S%H3045>know<s%>: if it be in <S%H4777>rebellion<s%>, or if in <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3467>(save<s%> thou us not this <S%H3117>day<s%>,)

that we have <S%H1129>built<s%> us an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> away from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; or if to <S%H5927>offer<s%> thereon <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> or <S%H5930>meal-offering<s%>, or if to <S%H6213>offer<s%> sacrifices <S%H8002>of<s%> <S%H2077>peace-offerings<s%> <S%H3068>thereon<s%>, let Jehovah himself require <S%H1245>it<s%>;

and if we have not rather out of <S%H1674>carefulness<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H1697>this<s%>, and of <S%H559>purpose<s%>, saying, In time to <S%H4279>come<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> might <S%H559>speak<s%> unto our <S%H1121>children<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What have ye to do with <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5414>made<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> a <S%H1366>border<s%> between us and <S%H1121>you<s%>, ye children of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>; ye have no <S%H2506>portion<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: so might your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7673>make<s%> our <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7673>cease<s%> <S%H1115>from<s%> <S%H3372>fearing<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Therefore we <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us now <S%H6213>prepare<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> us an <S%H4196>altar<s%>, not for <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, nor for <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>:

but it shall be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> between us and <S%H1755>you<s%>, and between our generations <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5647>us<s%>, that we may do the <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him with our <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%>, and with our <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, and with our <S%H5930>peace-offerings<s%>; that your <S%H1121>children<s%> may not <S%H559>say<s%> to our <S%H1121>children<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, Ye have no <S%H2506>portion<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Therefore <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H559>we<s%>, It shall be, when they so say to us or to our <S%H1755>generations<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, that we shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H7200>Behold<s%> the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%>, not for <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, nor for <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>; but it is a witness between us and <S%H5707>you<s%>.

Far <S%H2486>be<s%> it from us that we should <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> away this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> for <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, for <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, or for <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, besides the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And when <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, even the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were with <S%H8085>him<s%>, heard the <S%H1697>words<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%>, it pleased them <S%H3190>well<s%>.

And <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, This <S%H3117>day<s%> we <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4603>us<s%>, because ye have not committed this <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H227>now<s%> have ye <S%H5337>delivered<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H5387>princes<s%>, <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H7725>brought<s%> them <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and spake no <S%H559>more<s%> of going <S%H5927>up<s%> against them to <S%H6635>war<s%>, to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the children of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H5707>Ed<s%>: For, said they, it is a witness between us that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%>.
